fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use your random abilities each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the start of each day, generate a random verb at https://randomwordgenerator.com/verb.php. You will be given an ability that allows you to do that verb. Idk host can try to make it make sense ig lmao. Yeah therell be no problem with this whatsoever. Oh uh yeah the ability only lasts for like that night and yeah it doesnt like you dont like keep it otw you could get like nuke or smth and yeah and also like rng all the way yessir.
